node.title: An escape from the Great Hack
node.excerpt: I canâ€™t help but think how unfair it is that in todayâ€™s digital society, people are being treated like products, because there is no such thing as a â€˜freeâ€™ platform without YOU being the product.

node.title: ThreeFold's Long Story Short
node.excerpt: The truth is that ThreeFold is a big project. Here we will try to make things a little simpler for you.

node.title: Our Magical Zero-Node
node.excerpt: The Zero-OS (Stateless Operating System) node technology is based on technology that has been developed and innovated for 15 years in an incubation center..

node.title: The need for ThreeFold's neutral internet
node.excerpt: The Internet is no longer the neutral place it used to be. +80% of the Internet capacity is delivered by a handful of companies.

node.title: A new approach to the Internet Architecture
node.excerpt: The Edge internet needs a different approach. So, we started as from scratch and shaped a totally new approach..

node.title: Zero People IT is the Future
node.excerpt: Classic IT infrastructure setup is complex and is not cost-effective. Applications need a specific environment to operate in, built by integrating different technology components from different vendors. Elements of such a setup are operating systems, storage systems, networks, security systems, authentication systems, and more.
